mapper.insert: insert into child (classes, name, sex, age, birthday, id_card, registered_residence, height, weight, nation, address, phone, admission, only_one_child, remarks, add_time, update_time) values (#{classes}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{birthday}, #{idCard}, #{registeredResidence}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{nation}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{admission}, #{onlyOneChild}, #{remarks}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update child set classes = #{classes}, name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, age = #{age}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address}, admission = #{admission}, id_card = #{idCard}, registered_residence = #{registeredResidence}, nation = #{nation}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, phone = #{phone}, only_one_child = #{onlyOneChild}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
